application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London : South of the M1 Junction 1 / North Circular and to the East of Brent Terrace
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 1.8A (minor temporary works) comprising hoarding and fencing details associated with infrastructure, enabling works and basement works within Plot 12 of 1B (South) sub-phase, Plot 13 of Phase 1C sub-phase, Plot 14 and Plot 15 of Phase 2 (South) (Plots) sub-phase, a part of Part of High Street South (excluding High Street South East Works) of Phase 2 (South) (Plots) sub-phase, and a part of Claremont Park Road Part 2 of Phase 2 (South) (Plots) sub-phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/14 for the comprehensive development of Brent Cross Cricklewood.
